abstract: Organization seeking to reinstate Nebraska's death penalty says it has collected 166,692 signatures, enough to put issue on ballot in 2016 and likely enough to stop repeal from going into effect.
lead_paragraph: An organization campaigning to reinstate Nebraska’s death penalty after lawmakers repealed it in May said Wednesday it has collected more than enough signatures to place the issue before voters in 2016.

headline.main: Nebraska: Vote Sought on Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Vote Sought on Death Penalty

snippet: An organization campaigning to reinstate Nebraska’s death penalty after lawmakers repealed it in May said Wednesday it has collected more than enough signatures to place the issue before voters in 2016.
